name: Youth Housing and Shelter Resources
description: In partnership with SF HSH, Dolores Community Services is a designated Coordinated Entry (CE) Access Point for homeless youth (aged 18 to 24 years old) to find permanent supportive housing and rapid re-housing in San Francisco. Services offered includes: - Problem solving services - Housing assessment and prioritization Eligibility: - Living in a housing unit while experiencing domestic violence, sexual, or physical abuse - Living in an unsheltered location (street, car, etc.) - Living in an eme

agency: Mission Action (formerly Dolores Street Community Services)
